7a39da35-a32e-4996-8192-d62472f7b5d1.description: Earners of this badge will learn how racism and discrimination impacts newcomers in the workplace, and how to become more inclusive leaders. Participants will improve their understanding of cultural inclusion, heard about lived experiences of newcomers, and participated in a discussion around how they can take action to become more effective leaders and allies for newcomers to Canada.
7a39da35-a32e-4996-8192-d62472f7b5d1.name: Achev: Cultural Sensitivity and Inclusivity in the Workplace Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Achēv has partnered with Canadian Western Bank to offer a complimentary workshop to current and aspiring people leaders who want to learn more on how racism and discrimination impacts newcomers in the workplace, and how to become more inclusive leaders. Participants will improve their understanding of cultural inclusion, hear about lived experiences of newcomers, and participate in a discussion around how they can take action to become more effective leaders and allies for newcomers to Canada.

skills.name: Apply Concepts Of Diversity And Inclusion

56534fcc-a5a0-4125-bace-e36387df5eea.description: At Achēv, we have over 30 years of experience working with job seekers from diverse backgrounds and employers of all sizes, sectors, and geographies. We understand the challenges organizations face while building inclusive cultures. We also have seen the many benefits that come with that type of culture. Research has shown that diverse and inclusive workplaces lead to an increase in the quality of decision-making, higher levels of innovation, increased staff retention, and higher revenues.
56534fcc-a5a0-4125-bace-e36387df5eea.name: Achēv Inclusion

badge_template_activities.title: This program will allow participants to discover their own biases and their impacts. Gain a historical perspective of difference and discrimination in Canada. Examine potential barriers to equity, diversity, and inclusion. Provide tangible actions that will lead to a more diverse, inclusive, and equitable culture. Strengthen an organization by enriching the culture and relationships among people, teams, and communities.
